snippet.title: Mini-Mech Mayhem | Full Reveal Trailer | PSVR | Available Q1 2019
snippet.description: Mini-Mech Mayhem is a deeply funny table-top VR battle game for single players and up to four players online. Team up with your lil’ Mech buddy to plan a flawless strategy, then marvel at just how wrong you were! Not to worry, play some power cards to get your team back on track, or dare to trust in your instincts and crafty skills, and pull off a stunning win!
